original_text: But when they departed from Perga, they came to Antioch in Pisidia, and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and sat down.
korean_text: 그들은 버가에서 더 나아가 비시디아 안디옥에 이르러 안식일에 회당에 들어가 앉으니라

sentences.original_text: But when they departed from Perga,
they came to Antioch in Pisidia,
and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day,
